oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How to Keep Both the Consultant and the Local Veterinarian Involved: Part 1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Miles, Delbert G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: beef production
cost-effective
owner
consultant
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Regardless of our role in beef production, it is important to constantly focus on what is best for the cattle and the owner of the cattle. If all involved keep this as the primary goal everyone can make significant cost-effective contributions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 114
